title: Adobe GenStudio for Performance Marketing Adds Autonomous Campaign Generation
summary: Adobe expands GenStudio with autonomous campaign generation capabilities, enabling marketers to input a brief and receive fully assembled multi-channel campaigns with AI-generated creative variations.

title: Adobe Experience Platform Gets Real-Time CDP Enhancements With Federated Data Composition
summary: Adobe enhances its Real-Time CDP with federated data composition, allowing brands to activate audience segments directly from their data warehouses without moving data into Adobe's infrastructure.

title: Firefly 4.0: Adobe's Latest Generative Model Produces Brand-Consistent Video Content
summary: Adobe Firefly 4.0 introduces video generation with brand guardrails, allowing enterprises to produce on-brand video content at scale while maintaining visual identity standards across all outputs.

title: Adobe Sensei AI Now Powers Predictive Audiences Across Journey Optimizer
summary: Adobe integrates Sensei's predictive AI models into Journey Optimizer, enabling marketers to build audience segments based on predicted behaviors like churn likelihood and purchase propensity.

title: Marketo Engage Gets AI-Powered Lead Scoring That Learns From Sales Outcomes
summary: Adobe updates Marketo Engage with self-learning AI lead scoring that continuously refines its models based on closed-won and closed-lost CRM data, improving MQL-to-SQL conversion by 28%.

title: Adobe and Microsoft Deepen Integration: Experience Cloud Data Flows Into Copilot
summary: Adobe and Microsoft announce expanded partnership enabling Experience Cloud insights to surface directly within Microsoft 365 Copilot, letting marketers access campaign data in their daily workflow tools.

title: Adobe Analytics Introduces AI Anomaly Detection for Cross-Channel Marketing Data
summary: Adobe Analytics adds AI-powered anomaly detection that monitors marketing performance data across all channels, automatically alerting teams to unusual trends and suggesting root-cause explanations.

title: Adobe Summit 2026 Preview: Expect Major AI Agent Announcements for Experience Cloud
summary: Analysts expect Adobe to unveil a suite of autonomous AI agents for Experience Cloud at its upcoming Summit conference, with agents capable of managing campaigns, content, and analytics independently.
